e: ￹`Ma~`papisi~`pising~ `kita~.￺Let's meet face to face.￻讓我們相互見面
￹`Papi~`sing~ `kita~ `a~ `tayra~. `O~ `papi~`sing~ `aca~ `ita~￺Let's go and make our appearance (at a meeting). We won't stay.￻我們去照個面將不逗留
￹`Awaay~ `ko~ `pising~ `ako~ `anini~. `Pa~`'oning~ `kiso~ `to~ `pising~ `ako~.￺I have lost face. You stained my face / made me lose face.￻我今天沒有面子，你丟盡我的面子，你使我失面子
